title: Train Control / Brake / High
text: The braking system shall stop the train within 800 m when the emergency brake is applied at 160 km/h on dry track.
acceptance_criteria: Given speed = 160 km/h and emergency brake applied on dry track, then stopping distance <= 800 m in 10 consecutive runs.
suggestions_json: [{"source":"AI","message":"Refine requirement: Stop distance ≤ 800 m from emergency brake command at 160.0 ± 1.0 km/h on dry, straight (R ≥ 1000 m), level (|grade| ≤ 2 ‰) track with train at maximum operating mass; distance measured from command to standstill.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Adds tolerances, track geometry, loading, and measurement reference to eliminate ambiguity and ensure repeatable testing.","confidence":0.78},{"source":"AI","message":"Acceptance criteria: 10 consecutive emergency stops under the above conditions; each run: initial speed 160 ± 1 km/h, stopping distance ≤ 800 m, no precipitation in prior 60 min, crosswind ≤ 5 m/s.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Defines environmental bounds and speed tolerance to reduce variance and improve comparability.","confidence":0.72},{"source":"AI","message":"Acceptance criteria (measurement): Use calibrated distance measurement with absolute error ≤ 0.5% or 5 m (whichever greater); synchronize brake command timestamp and distance measurement within ±50 ms.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Ensures measurement accuracy and synchronization for reliable pass/fail determination.","confidence":0.7}]

title: Train Control / HMI / Medium
text: The HMI should display the status quickly and clearly for the driver.
issues_json: [{"rule_id":"AMB-001","category":"AMBIGUITY","severity":"MINOR","message":"Modal verb 'should' detected (weak commitment). Prefer 'shall' or measurable phrasing.","field":"text","evidence":"Train Control / HMI / Medium The HMI should display the status quickly and clearly for t","recommendation":"Remplacer les modaux faibles (should/may/…) par une formulation normative mesurable (shall + métriques)."},{"rule_id":"AMB-002","category":"AMBIGUITY","severity":"MINOR","message":"Ambiguous term 'quick' detected (not measurable).","field":"text","evidence":"I / Medium The HMI should display the status quickly and clearly for the driver.","recommendation":"Remplacer les termes qualitatifs par des critères quantifiés (temps, taux, seuils, tolérances)."},{"rule_id":"TST-002","category":"TESTABILITY","severity":"MINOR","message":"Acceptance criteria missing (verification might be unclear).","field":"acceptance_criteria","evidence":"acceptance_criteria=''","recommendation":"Ajouter des critères d’acceptation concrets (Given/When/Then, seuils, tolérances)."}]
suggestions_json: [{"source":"RULE","message":"Remplacer les modaux faibles (should/may/…) par une formulation normative mesurable (shall + métriques).","rule_id":"AMB-001","rationale":"Modal verb 'should' detected (weak commitment). Prefer 'shall' or measurable phrasing.","confidence":null},{"source":"RULE","message":"Remplacer les termes qualitatifs par des critères quantifiés (temps, taux, seuils, tolérances).","rule_id":"AMB-002","rationale":"Ambiguous term 'quick' detected (not measurable).","confidence":null},{"source":"RULE","message":"Ajouter des critères d’acceptation concrets (Given/When/Then, seuils, tolérances).","rule_id":"TST-002","rationale":"Acceptance criteria missing (verification might be unclear).","confidence":null},{"source":"AI","message":"Replace with: 'The HMI shall present the current state of each driver-visible status indicator within 500 ms from receipt of the corresponding input signal.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Removes 'should' and quantifies 'quickly' with a measurable response time.","confidence":0.8},{"source":"AI","message":"Add AC: 'Status text/numerals shall have ≥4.0 mm character height at 700±50 mm viewing distance and a contrast ratio ≥4.5:1 against background.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Makes 'clearly' measurable via typography and contrast; verifiable by inspection.","confidence":0.78},{"source":"AI","message":"Add AC: 'A persistent status area shall be visible on the main driving screen without navigation; each critical status icon shall be ≥10 mm and accompanied by a text label.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Ensures constant visibility and avoids ambiguity by defining size and labeling; inspectable.","confidence":0.74}]

title: Medical Device / Infusion Pump / Critical
text: The infusion pump shall deliver 5 mL/h ± 5% for flow rates between 1 mL/h and 10 mL/h at 23°C with saline.
acceptance_criteria: Given setpoint = 5 mL/h, temperature = 23°C, fluid = saline, then measured average flow is within ±5% over 60 minutes.
suggestions_json: [{"source":"AI","message":"REQ: For setpoints 1.0–10.0 mL/h, at 23°C ±1°C using 0.9% saline, the pump shall deliver an average volumetric flow within ±5.0% of the setpoint when averaged over 60 minutes after a 5-minute stabilization.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Clarifies accuracy applies across the full range, defines stabilization and averaging window, and removes ambiguity about 5 mL/h.","confidence":0.78},{"source":"AI","message":"AC: Test at 1.0, 5.0, and 10.0 mL/h; exclude first 5 min; measure for 60 min gravimetrically with scale resolution ≤0.01 g and uncertainty ≤0.1% of reading; pass if each average is within ±5% of setpoint.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Covers range endpoints and mid-point, specifies measurement method and instrument performance, and sets clear pass/fail criteria.","confidence":0.75},{"source":"AI","message":"AC: Use standard infusion set with new tubing; maintain outlet backpressure 100 ±10 mmHg; ambient 23°C ±1°C; fluid 0.9% saline; document density used for mass-to-volume conversion.","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Controls key test conditions that affect flow and ensures reproducibility and traceability of measurements.","confidence":0.69}]

title: Automotive ECU / Diagnostics / Low
text: The ECU shall provide diagnostic information if needed.
acceptance_criteria: Diagnostic information includes DTC code, timestamp, and current operating mode
issues_json: [{"rule_id":"AMB-002","category":"AMBIGUITY","severity":"MINOR","message":"Ambiguous term 'if needed' detected (not measurable).","field":"text","evidence":"The ECU shall provide diagnostic information if needed. Diagnostic information includes DTC code, t","recommendation":"Remplacer les termes qualitatifs par des critères quantifiés (temps, taux, seuils, tolérances)."}]
suggestions_json: [{"source":"RULE","message":"Remplacer les termes qualitatifs par des critères quantifiés (temps, taux, seuils, tolérances).","rule_id":"AMB-002","rationale":"Ambiguous term 'if needed' detected (not measurable).","confidence":null},{"source":"AI","message":"Rewrite requirement: 'The ECU shall provide diagnostic information (DTC code, timestamp, current operating mode) upon receipt of a valid diagnostic request on the diagnostics interface.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Removes the ambiguous 'if needed' by specifying a clear, testable trigger (valid diagnostic request).","confidence":0.87},{"source":"AI","message":"Alternative trigger: 'The ECU shall record diagnostic information (DTC code, timestamp, current operating mode) when a DTC is set and make it retrievable via the diagnostics interface.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Defines an event-based condition that is measurable by inducing a fault and verifying stored/retrievable data.","confidence":0.8},{"source":"AI","message":"Add acceptance criteria: 'Given ≥1 stored DTC, a valid diagnostic request returns at least one record with DTC code, timestamp, and current operating mode; given 0 stored DTCs, the ECU returns an explicit no-DTC indicator; given an invalid request, the ECU returns an error response.'","rule_id":"AI-001","rationale":"Provides clear pass/fail conditions for normal, empty, and error cases to eliminate ambiguity.","confidence":0.76}]
